name: Grilled Guacamole
author: maddysmom
summary: A chunky, creamy guacamole with just the right amount of zip!  Grilled avocados add a smoky, caramelized taste.
ingredients: ½ teaspoon hot pepper sauce (e.g. Tabasco™), or to taste
2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro, or to taste
directions: Preheat an outdoor grill for low heat, and lightly oil grate
Cook the avocados on the preheated grill until just slightly browned and caramelized
Allow to cool to room temperature, then remove the skins, and cube
Place 1/2 cup of the avocado into a mixing bowl, and mash together with the onion, jalapeno pepper, and sour cream
Stir in the lime juice, garlic salt, and hot pepper sauce, then gently fold in the remaining avocado along with the cherry tomatoes and cilantro
